item.title: I debated ChatGPT and won
item.description: It had this idea after I saw some intellectual idiot ramble in a long-winded slepp-inducing lecture on that pseudo-philosopher Nietzsche. So I decided to take ChatGPT 4 to task by debating it on this topic. I won’t make any comments and post our interaction directly as it occurred: Round 1: Exploratory jabs Jan: Can you summarize Nietzsche’s view with respect to religion and belief in God? was he an atheist? or a eugenecist?
